record.field:
route = env['edi.route'].sudo().search([('id', '=', env['ir.model.data'].xmlid_to_res_id('edi_af_facility.office_campus_route'))])
record = env['hr.department'].sudo().search([('office_code','=','0248')])
vals = { 'name': 'get office campus msg', 'edi_type': env.ref('edi_af_facility.office_campus').id, 'model': record._name, 'res_id': record.id, 'route_id': route.id, 'route_type': 'edi_af_location', }
message = env['edi.message'].sudo().create(vals) message.sudo().pack() route.sudo().run()
